original_title: Red Shoe Diaries 8: Night of Abandon
overview: Night of Abandon: A wild blissful night in Brazil during Carnival.  Liar's Tale: A burned out photojournalist's obsession with a high-class call girl awakens her ability to feel again.  In the Blink of an Eye: A passionate boxer seduces a happily married woman.
title: Red Shoe Diaries 8: Night of Abandon
